DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to look at the use of the wound vacuum assisted closure (VAC) versus standard wet to dry dressing in treating lower leg fasciotomies.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Determine the Utility of Wound Vacuum Assisted Closure (VAC) Compared to Conventional Saline Dressing Changes
DOC.criteria: four compartment fasciotomies performed on one or both lower extremities subject and/or subject's legally authorized representative (nextofkin) has voluntarily signed and dated informed consent. inability to place wound VAC contraindications for wound VAC use pregnant females prisoners
